results.content: Excellent step by step intro to this amazing form builder software.
results.content_html: Excellent step by step intro to this amazing form builder software.

results.content: Although I've been playing around with Formidable Forms for a few months now, I still found a lot of useful information here. Thanks Tom!
results.content_html: Although I've been playing around with Formidable Forms for a few months now, I still found a lot of useful information here. Thanks Tom!

results.content: Too little advanced stuff to demonstrate the power of Formidable Forms. Half of the course if a simple breakdown of what the various elements are e.g. checkboxes, text fields etc.. If you don't know what these things are, you're probably in the wrong alley. The author demonstrate throughout the course that he has a good solid understanding of what he is doing and is able to communicate and pass on his knowledge in a clear and understandable way. Unfortunately, the course does not extend far in the advanced concepts and therefore leaves me a bit dissappointed.

results.content: pretty straightforward, appreciate his brevity. Could benefit on a bit more explanation on when to use the various functions

response.content:
Hi Douglas,

Could you please let me know which functions you would like more of an explanation about?  I strive to make this a 5 star course for everyone and I would like to add additional content that will help you with what you need.

Cheers,

Tom

results.content: Asistir a este curso es exacto para mi aprendizaje y momento de desarrollo. Si es un gran curso para hacer y revisar. Me agradó el destino para llegar a hacer un appointment como resultado de ir aprendiendo formidable forms.

response.content: Thanks for the great review Ricardo. Please don't hesitate to as any further questions you may have.

results.content: Helpful to recap and really useful to learn about all the add ons which I haven't used before. Really well explained and clear. Excellent course and well worth the money.
results.content_html: Helpful to recap and really useful to learn about all the add ons which I haven't used before. Really well explained and clear. Excellent course and well worth the money.

results.content: I still working on this course. What  I didn't like very much since the beginning was that is based on a previous version of Formidable Forms, so the plugin right know is quite different. I use formidable forms from 1 year ago and bought the course trying to figure it out how to solve some things, hope that at the end of the course acquire the knowledge to solve them. I found it a little slow from the beggining and that is part of whay I give my primary calification.
